page.title: 10Energy and Law-Witton
page.content: {Solid Fuel}Most supplies of solid fuel are from depots at Bacton & Ebridge Mill near N.Walsham.Many older houses,the council houses & old peoples bungalows still use solid fuel,not having central heaing. {Fossil fuels}oil is delivered by all the heating oil companies:most new houses & some older ones have oil fired central heating. {Electricity & other fuels}Bottled gas & supplies of logs are delivered. Electricity from Eastern Electricity Board comes on overhead cables which are vunerable to storms & frost.2 houses have solar panals.There is no piped gas from Bacton Gas Site though the pipes pass under our fields. {Law}Occasional police panda cars patrol the area.There is no resident policeman & very little crime
